text:
Local Government Order 2014

I make the following order under section 137(1)(b) of the Local Government Act 1993 .

13 January 2014

BRYAN GREEN

Minister for Local Government

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Local Government Order 2014 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Transfer of land to Flinders Council
        (1) The land situated at Cape Barren Island in Tasmania, comprised in Volume 211480, Folio 76 of the Register kept under section 33 of the Land Titles Act 1980 , is transferred to the Flinders Council.
        (2) The land situated at Cape Barren Island in Tasmania, comprised in Volume 202146, Folio 1 of the Register kept under section 33 of the Land Titles Act 1980 , is transferred to the Flinders Council.
        (3) The land situated at Cape Barren Island in Tasmania, comprised in Volume 200144, Folio 1 of the Register kept under section 33 of the Land Titles Act 1980 , is transferred to the Flinders Council.
        (4) The land situated at Cape Barren Island in Tasmania, comprised in Volume 211784, Folio 1 of the Register kept under section 33 of the Land Titles Act 1980 , is transferred to the Flinders Council.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 22 January 2014

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
